item.how_to_find_us: Al R."s Orange Traffic Cones after 5pm, Let's meet outside the fence - about halfway up the hill in front of a small grove of trees between the fenced-in area and the Capitol building.
item.why: this is free and a great time, bring picnic to share Coolers and alcohol are not allowed inside the fenced area at the park; however, Bring blankets, chairs, coolers, BYO food/snacks/beverages, photo ID

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: outdoors , blues and fun -- what could be better
